        DESCRIPTION:
After the events of Max Payne 2 was eight years old. Max did not cop - he drunken, unemployed sitting on painkillers. Broken. Crushed. Without a goal. But, by chance after moving to Brazil, he entered the service in a private security agency and is assigned to protect the family of successful real estate dealer. Soon Max in their own skin will feel, not only in New York, and Sao Paulo live by their own laws ...
